message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it could really benefit you. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $19,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $19,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can we meet in the middle at $14,500?

Bob, I appreciate you countering. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $14,500 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $15,000?
